query:
SELECT 'time_series' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT 'economic_events', COUNT(*) FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT 'sources', COUNT(*) FROM sources
UNION ALL SELECT 'datasets', COUNT(*) FROM datasets
UNION ALL SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users;

mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT 'time_series' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT 'economic_events', COUNT(*) FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT 'sources', COUNT(*) FROM sources
UNION ALL SELECT 'datasets', COUNT(*) FROM datasets
UNION ALL SELECT 'users', COUNT(*) FROM users;
